text.headerText: It is a convenient universal voting tool, allows the supervisory board to register for meetings and vote by filling out an electronic ballot form on the website
text.aboutText: The Electronic Voting service is a convenient universal voting tool that allows shareholders / members of the supervisory board to register at meetings / meetings and vote by filling out an electronic ballot form on the website, watch the webcast of the meeting / meeting, get acquainted with the agenda and materials of the meeting / meeting , maintain online communication with the issuer using a single interface and remote identification using a verified account on the Public Services Portal (ESIA). To access the E-voting, no special technical means are required; connection to the platform is possible from anywhere in the world if there is an Internet connection.
text.serviceMainText1: Ability for shareholders / members of supervisory boards to vote at General Meetings of Shareholders / Meetings of Supervisory Boards using a single interface and a single identification procedure.
text.serviceMainText2: The ability to identify users using the identification means they already have, without the additional need to appear in person
text.serviceMainText3: The ability to «brand» the meeting page using your logo and the corporate color of the issuer
text.serviceMainText4: The ability to select the required services.
text.serviceMainText5: Possibility to vote both through the general portal and via a direct link to the meeting / session where you want to vote.
text.serviceMainText6: The use of secure communication channels that provide protection against changes in the content of the document and signature forgery.
text.serviceMainText7: You can participate in the General Meeting of Shareholders regardless of the distance from the venue. All you need is Internet access and a computer, tablet or smartphone
text.serviceMainText8: A simple letter is delivered on average 10-20 days. Email newsletter - instantly.
text.serviceMainText9: Voting is carried out through closed communication channels that provide protection against changes in the content of the document and signature forgery.
text.serviceMainText10: management and investment attractiveness, including through compliance with the recommendations of the Corporate Governance Code.
text.serviceMainText11: securities in the voting process and, accordingly, increasing their activity in the management of the company
text.serviceMainText12: information on the results of voting and the possibility of online communication with the holders of securities.
text.serviceMainText13: Acceleration of the processing process and counting of votes
text.serviceMainText14:
Prerequisites for reducing costs for
mailing lists.
